title: ProxyInstance (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK ProxyInstance EXTENDS
BaseInstance
This implementation can be extended by Proxy-FBs.  It already
contains the proper Initialize method and the properties
from interface IBaseInstance.
